body_html: I am also interested in having a good way to remember the LSTM states for the next batch. This question was also asked by me on StackOverflow: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/38241410/tensorflow-remember-lstm-state-for-next-batch-stateful-lstm

body: I am also interested in having a good way to remember the LSTM states for the next batch. This question was also asked by me on StackOverflow: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/38241410/tensorflow-remember-lstm-state-for-next-batch-stateful-lstm
